page.title: 10FISHING;LEISURE,ABBEY WOOD
page.content:
In my spare time I do canoing,sailing, reading, fishing and lots of other things. My favourite leisure is fishing. The biggest fish I ever caught was on holiday. It was a mackerel. It was about 47cms long and 6 cms wide. We had 49 mackerel. I helped my dad and brother gut the fish. I cut off the head, tail and fins and also scrape the guts out. My hands were covered in blood. We put the guts in a sealed bag. My brother and I saw a boy with a sword fish. It was about 52 cms long. It was only a little one. It had a pointed nose. For tea we had mackerel, peas and chips with butter on the peas and fish. It was very nice indeed.
Marc Inwood, Age 11 yrs.
